text:
My name is Brandon Potts and I'm a software engineer. I went to Virginia Tech and double majored in Computer Science
  and Applied Mathematics, and have an interested in product development, full stack engineering,
  data science, and mathematical modeling.

Professionally, I have experience in web development, product development, mobile development, and application
  development. On the side, I've also built websites, mobile, apps, and video games.
I'm interested in opportunities in software engineering, full stack web development, and data science.
